channel.title: FAU AI in Medicine
channel.description: Recent content on FAU AI in Medicine

item.title: About
item.description: AI in Medicine is a group dedicated to advancing artificial intelligence (AI) in the medical field through hands on workshops, speaker sessions, and open forums.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message

item.title: FDA Guidelines for AI in Medicine
item.description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) now pervades almost every application and website we use. It’s also rapidly entering the healthcare space. There’s a common understanding that government regulation plays catch-up with innovation. This is especially true when it comes to software. In radiology, there’s a plethora of papers on detecting lesions in mammograms [1], brains [2], and chest x-rays [3], yet many advances in AI research are miles away from real-world use in the clinic.

item.title: Team
item.description: html { box-sizing: border-box; } *, *:before, *:after { box-sizing: inherit; } .column { float: left; width: 25%; margin-bottom: 16px; padding: 0 8px; } @media screen and (max-width: 650px) { .column { width: 100%; display: block; } } .card { box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); } .container { padding: 0 16px; } .container::after, .row::after { content: ""; clear: both; display: table; } .title { color: grey; } .
